alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 16 at 2:27PM PDT until April 16 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult to impossible, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Drivers on Highway 395 should be prepared for dangerous driving conditions due to sudden strong crosswinds and reduced visibilities due to blowing dust. Road closures are possible.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley
